The iOS xcframework built based on original deepspeech_ios solution (native_clients/swift) of version v0.9.3

To build xcframework:

1. Install bazel and export to PATH

2. Build xcframework using build_xcframework.sh

cd native_clients/swift
./build_xcframework.sh

3. Put deepspeech_ios.xcframework from native_clients/swift/xcframework to ThirdParty folder
